titleStmt.title: Lettre ecrite a un nonconformiste, au sujet de la derniére déclaration de sa majesté, pour la tolérance traduite de l'anglois.
Letter to a dissenter. French
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Letter to a dissenter.
Signed at end: T.W. [i.e. The writer, George Savile, Marquis of Halifax].
Actual place of publication from: Weller, E.O. Falsche Druckorte.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
